nodes.text: "The Contact" was a short story written by Charlene Newcomb & Rich Handley and illustrated by Steve Bryant. Intended to act as a sequel to the stories Crimson Bounty, A Certain Point of View, and Crimson Jailbreak, it was made for Star Wars Adventure Journal, presumably for the 18th issue, but never made it in due to West End Games losing its license to Star Wars and being put out of business shortly thereafter, although it was later released to the Internet.
